topic.domains: (topic abbrev-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (topic equation-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic mathml-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic svg-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)
topic.title: Learning Domain Test
topic.shortdesc: Provides test cases for learning domain interaction elements (questions and answers)

body.p: The "learning 1" domain provides interactions (assessments or questions and answers) as defined in DITA 1.2. The "learning 2" domain is new with DITA 1.3 and extends the content models of the assessments to allow block elements in questions, answers, and feedback.

learningAssessment.domains: (topic learningBase+learningInteractionBase-d+learningInteractionBase2) (topic learningAssessment) a(props deliveryTarget) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic ut-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic learningInteractionBase-d) (topic learningInteractionBase2-d) (topic learningInteractionBase-d learning-d) (topic learningInteractionBase2-d learning2-d) (topic learningmeta-d)
learningAssessment.title: Learning 1 Test Cases

section.title: Interactions with no answers or feedback
section.p: These interactions have no answers or feedback. They reflect the simplest use of the markup.

lcOpenQuestion.lcQuestion: This is an open question interaction: The struggle of class against class is what kind of struggle? Explain your answer.

lcSingleSelect.lcQuestion: Single select: Choose the correct answer:

lcMultipleSelect.lcQuestion: This is a multi-select: Choose all that apply:

lcMatching.lcQuestion: This is a matching question. Match the artist with the work:

lcHotspot.lcQuestion: This is a hotspot question. This is a diorama of the Apollo 11 moon landing, using a real Lunar Lander that was never sent to space. It represents the initial egress of the astronaunts onto the lunar surface. Based on your knowledge of the Apollo 11 mission, select Neil Armstrong.

image.alt: Diorama of the Apollo 11 moon landing (National Air and Space Museum)

lcTrueFalse.lcQuestion: This is a true-false question: Neil Armstrong crashed a lunar lander simulator during training, walked away from the crash, and was seen calmly sitting in his office an hour later.

lcSequencing.lcQuestion: This is a sequencing question: Put the painters in order of date of birth:

learningAssessment.domains: (topic learningBase+learningInteractionBase-d+learningInteractionBase2) (topic learningAssessment) a(props deliveryTarget) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic ut-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic learningInteractionBase-d) (topic learningInteractionBase2-d) (topic learningInteractionBase-d learning-d) (topic learningInteractionBase2-d learning2-d) (topic learningmeta-d)
learningAssessment.title: Learning 2 Test Cases
